text: Zlatan Ibrahimović (born 3 October 1981) is a former Swedish footballer. He is considered one of the best strikers of all time. He has scored over 560 career goals, and he has scored at least 1 goal in the last four decades. Ibrahimovic's mother is Croatian, and his father is Bosniak. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Club Season League National cup League cup Continental Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps
